Architecture.description: The cpu architecture of an application.

AutoStartConfiguration.description: Configuration for Auto Start of Application

properties.name: Enabled
properties.description: If set to true, the Application will automatically start. Defaults to true.

type.description: If set to true, the Application will automatically start. Defaults to true.

AutoStopConfiguration.description: Configuration for Auto Stop of Application

properties.name: Enabled
properties.description: If set to true, the Application will automatically stop after being idle. Defaults to true.

type.description: If set to true, the Application will automatically stop after being idle. Defaults to true.

properties.name: IdleTimeoutMinutes
properties.description: The amount of time [in minutes] to wait before auto stopping the Application when idle. Defaults to 15 minutes.

type.description: The amount of time [in minutes] to wait before auto stopping the Application when idle. Defaults to 15 minutes.

ConfigurationList.description: Runtime configuration for batch and interactive JobRun.

properties.name: Classification
properties.description: String with a maximum length of 1024.

type.description: String with a maximum length of 1024.

CpuSize.description: Per worker CPU resource. vCPU is the only supported unit and specifying vCPU is optional.

DiskSize.description: Per worker Disk resource. GB is the only supported unit and specifying GB is optional

properties.name: ImageUri
properties.description: The URI of an image in the Amazon ECR registry. This field is required when you create a new application. If you leave this field blank in an update, Amazon EMR will remove the image configuration.

type.description: The URI of an image in the Amazon ECR registry. This field is required when you create a new application. If you leave this field blank in an update, Amazon EMR will remove the image configuration.

properties.name: WorkerCount
properties.description: Initial count of workers to be initialized when an Application is started. This count will be continued to be maintained until the Application is stopped

type.description: Initial count of workers to be initialized when an Application is started. This count will be continued to be maintained until the Application is stopped

properties.name: Key
properties.description: Worker type for an analytics framework.

type.description: Worker type for an analytics framework.

properties.name: Enabled
properties.description: If set to false, managed logging will be turned off. Defaults to true.

type.description: If set to false, managed logging will be turned off. Defaults to true.

properties.name: EncryptionKeyArn
properties.description: KMS key ARN to encrypt the logs stored in managed persistence

type.description: KMS key ARN to encrypt the logs stored in managed persistence

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.description: Per worker CPU resource. vCPU is the only supported unit and specifying vCPU is optional.

properties.description: Tag map with key and value

properties.name: Type
properties.description: The type of the application

type.description: The type of the application

properties.name: WorkerTypeSpecifications
properties.description: The key-value pairs that specify worker type to WorkerTypeSpecificationInput. This parameter must contain all valid worker types for a Spark or Hive application. Valid worker types include Driver and Executor for Spark applications and HiveDriver and TezTask for Hive applications. You can either set image details in this parameter for each worker type, or in imageConfiguration for all worker types.

type.description: The key-value pairs that specify worker type to WorkerTypeSpecificationInput. This parameter must contain all valid worker types for a Spark or Hive application. Valid worker types include Driver and Executor for Spark applications and HiveDriver and TezTask for Hive applications. You can either set image details in this parameter for each worker type, or in imageConfiguration for all worker types.

properties.name: ApplicationId
properties.description: The ID of the EMR Serverless Application.

type.description: The ID of the EMR Serverless Application.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the EMR Serverless Application.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the EMR Serverless Application.
